website_summaries.verdict: Not practical or affordable for everyone, but offers comfortable support for many sufferers of plantar fasciitis.
pros: Podiatrist-designed insoles with reliable fit, comfort, and support to relieve pain
Users rave about the true-to-size custom fit
Inner core is both supportive and flexible
cons: Break-in period takes a while, but support also has the tendency to compress fairly quickly for some individuals

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have planter fasciitis and a high arch. I tried multiple insoles and these were the only one that had support where I needed it without rubbing against painful areas. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: These things work wonderfully - I most recently ran 6 miles without any ...
customer_reviews.text: I run ~15 miles a week and have noticeably flat feet. Prior to using insoles, I had suffered through running with an alarming amount of arch pain, which would start usually around the 4-5 mile mark. It would start off as an annoyance, and quickly propagate into unbearable, after which I would have to stop. I finally decided to do something about it, and ordered these insoles. These things work wonderfully - I most recently ran 6 miles without any foot pain, and am still going strong for several weeks now! For reference, I run in Nike Air Pegasus.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Yu

customer_reviews.title: This helps so much
customer_reviews.text: I have the same complaint as many, PF and could barely walk in the morning..this has made that more tolerable and throughout the day I am at least able to get around. Other things and supportive shoes have not worked for me, this is a blessing. I just bought another pair....only one thing the 7-71/2 is a bit larger than my 7 shoes..but hey, I can walk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat Feet
customer_reviews.text: I had tried Dr.Scholl's insoles and they were terrible, and made my feet and legs hurt more than before the insoles. I saw a listing of the top insoles for flat feet and thought I would try Samurai insoles--they are thinner and more flexible, plus my feet do not hurt as much. Also, my feet do not throb at night, as long as I use the insoles. I am elated that the pain in my feet has lessened.
customer_reviews.author: Delphimo

customer_reviews.title: My Feet Says Thank You
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. I have a serious problem of Plantar fasciitis and really needed some type of relief. I saw this item on Amazon and decided to try it. I am glad I did as it does offer quite a bit of relief. They were the right size (the same as my shoe size) and fits into any type of shoe I am wearing. I plan to order more to have spares.
customer_reviews.author: DeBorah F. James

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because recomend. Helped beat plantar fasciitis but liked Rite Aid brand as much if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bloom

customer_reviews.title: These save my feet when I forget my orthotics
customer_reviews.text: Long story but sometimes I leave my custom orthotics at work. In such a case these are way better than nothing. After several months of occasional use though, the glued-on (red) top cover is sliding to the outside. I still recommend them though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wells

customer_reviews.title: But I LOVE these insoles so much
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews. Shame on me because I read them avidly. But I LOVE these insoles so much, I welcomed writing this review! My flat feet went on a hike the other day with a generic grocery store brand - BIG mistake! (My first pair of Samurai were in my boots). Came home and instantly ordered two more pairs for my walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CookingMom

customer_reviews.title: Thin and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Mexico City knowing I would be doing a good amount of walking. They fit in my running shoes as well as my converse sneakers and were very comfortable. They provided sufficient arch support. They were just slightly big for my shoe by just a hair (I wear 7.5 in women's shoes), but it wasn't a huge problem. And as they are mostly "foam-y", I can't speak to how long they would last, but so far so good...
customer_reviews.author: brklnmom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable insoles
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent, it was a little long, so I had to cut It to fit in my shoes/sneakers. Now I can stand for a long time and walk as much as I want without experiencing any pain. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: They work and provide instant relief from pain
customer_reviews.text: Instant relief from the beginnings of plantar fasciitis from wearing too many party shoes to work. I was very pleasantly surprised and thus ordered 2 more sets for other shoes I wear frequently. Even played tennis in them. Truly a life saver
customer_reviews.author: J D Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: Is good product.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me, but it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent arch support and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: My hips ache if I don’t have arch support. I wear these in my golf shoes and I walk nine holes carrying my bag and no hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: Liztkid

customer_reviews.title: Flat footed. This needs more arch support.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with the great reviews and the price I paid. They’re okay. I have flat feet. I feel like it needs more arch support with the amount I paid. Thinking of trying my local drugstore for Dr. Scholls.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great feel, just wish they lasted longer than a month
customer_reviews.text: These feel great for my flat feet! My only complaint would be that they seem to wear down a little fast. I have only owned them for a month and did not use them every day, but there are already deep foot marks. I was hoping for a little more longevity from these after all of the great reviews and the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Greenwich Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I put them in my shoes and wore them for a hr around home then to work the next day. I stand in my feet all day and for the first time in 2 years my feet didnt ache after work. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less pain, low-profile insoles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip where I knew I would be doing a lot of walking. They helped immensely and were low-profile enough to fit into my Converse Chuck Taylors. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Using these insoles has drastically reduced the constant agony caused by plantar fasciitis. The improvement is simply remarkable. I daily hike 3 to 6 miles and can now do so without pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable insoles that work!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these after giving up on another brand and am happy I did. These insoles are comfortable, fit well and provide the support I need. The adjustment period was about a week. I’ve already ordered additional pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband on the job!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the insoles & says they make his feet feel so much better at the end of a long work day!
customer_reviews.author: Blondemomints

customer_reviews.title: good product for me
customer_reviews.text: have wheel spur on one foot and Mortons neuroma on the other and these relieve both issues and I can walk more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these insoles. I ordered a half size down so that i could easily move them from one pair of shoes to another. They are definitely helping with the P.F.
customer_reviews.author: jcrtx62

customer_reviews.title: Even though they were a little large, I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though they were a little large, I was able to cut them without a problem and fit them in my sneakers. I am a nurse and wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: These insoles are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These insoles are amazing! I have only worn them for short periods of time but the difference in how my feet feel is very noticeable to me. I feel like I am still wearing them for hours after I take my shoes off. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and offers great support
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and offers great support, be sure to work up to wearing them all day though because they are a huge change for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the lie! They don't help
customer_reviews.text: The insoles aren't any more helpful than the $15 insoles I bought at the store. There is nothing springy or cushiony about these insoles
customer_reviews.author: Temma

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The insoles fit perfectly in my shoes. I also really appreciated the email that came before product arrived with suggestions for best use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Soles for flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: I need insoles to help my flat feet. They help me from getting bunions.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Cragle

customer_reviews.title: Powerstep has a thicker sole more cushion while these ones have a stronger sole less cushion perfect for certain shoes like converse
customer_reviews.text: I use these and the Powerstep, Powerstep has a thicker sole more cushion while these ones have a stronger sole less cushion perfect for certain shoes like converse.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great inserts! Takes a little bit to get used to but they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this insert
customer_reviews.text: I really like this insert. My feet feel much better at the end of a long day with these in my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: dtwkaw

customer_reviews.title: I may buy more.
customer_reviews.text: Just had to cut a small amount off the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than my podiatrists!
customer_reviews.text: I paid SOO much money for custom orthotics a few years ago, just didn't have it this year. On a whim I tried Samurai Insoles, wow they're even better for my plantar fasciitis than my custom ones!
customer_reviews.author: DStabbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and they are the best
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable insoles I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable insoles I have ever purchased...Have bought multiple pairs to outfit all my shoes...A must try! I stand on my feet 15 hours a day...samurai soles make a huge difference in my world!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: I have heel pain and innersoles were hard as rocks offered no comfort at all, just more pain
customer_reviews.author: Allison Coulton

customer_reviews.title: These insoles are great
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these insoles. Helps my PF foot pain immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fit my shoes perfectly and took a LOT of the pain out of walking! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hobbesl

customer_reviews.title: Fit right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: No cutting needed. I'm a 7.5 and have plantar fasciitis in my left foot. I popped these inserts in and could feel the difference right away! I've been through many Dr Scholls inserts with absolutely NO luck. AND what a pain those are to return. I was skeptical about the Samuari Insoles but I know Amazon's return policy is amazing so I took a chance and I'm glad I did. Would recommend these for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: zdog

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable but I think they can use a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have worn them for up to 4 hours and have not had no problems. They are comfortable but I think they can use a little more paddling on the heel, other than that, they are prefect!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Romero

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Began relieving heel pain almost immediately. I could take a walk and work in the garden that afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Real support for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Samurai's actually have an orthotic built in, it's not just a block of squishy foam. Well made, seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little too large. Had to trim them down.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stedman

customer_reviews.title: these are very comfortable. I wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: these are very comfortable. I wear them all the time, and my feet never get tired.I play tennis in them, and do a lot of walking. Very happy that I ordered them. Martha Sue Bethshares
customer_reviews.author: Martha S. Bethshares

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found these
customer_reviews.text: My coworker turned me on to these, wow what a difference after wearing these for a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: HughG

customer_reviews.title: I sent these as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I sent these as a gift to a friend, she loves them, I should try them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style
customer_reviews.text: These inserts are very thin and comfortable. They fit well in all kinds of shoes. I use them in tennis shoes and dress shoes, but you still feel the support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer-great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am a flat-footed runner and had the $400 prescribed orthotics from my doctor. These orthotics are MUCH cheaper, but still fit in my running shoes and provide excellent support. I buy a new set with eat pair of shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didnt take my foot pain away but i have only been using it for week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure have them to a family member and so far seem to be fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel like an expensive overly priced regular pair of insoles. :(
customer_reviews.author: Maggie F.

customer_reviews.title: Provide great support
customer_reviews.text: I had no break in time with these Samurai Insoles orthotics. They fit my shoes and my feet just right. I feel confident moving forward that I will have the support and alignment needed to eliminate future metatarsal stress fractures.
customer_reviews.author: BoscoJones

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Got the wrong product. Ordered to have when other old ones were worn. Open box not the product. Have to see how to return
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: disapointed
customer_reviews.text: No they didn't meet mine or the doctor's expectations. Plus they will not give me the support needed. If one star had is bad; I would not give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Renae K Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart after a month...
customer_reviews.text: While these do feel good, I have to mention that the quality of the materials may not stand a lot of moisture. I got caught in the rain yesterday, removed the insoles, dried them and my shoes separately. Once dried, put them back inside and used for the rest of the day. Woke up today to find that the insoles are coming apart. It's only been a month since I bought these and I work a desk job. Wouldn't buy again and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MSantos

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually taken aback at how quickly these insoles relieved my plantar fasciitis pain. Now truth be told, I have been doing my best to try and treat it properly- and was advised to get insoles. These had a great rating for the price. But they have made a huge difference in my walking!
customer_reviews.author: PattiKMO

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Big!
customer_reviews.text: These insoles could not even be forced into a size 7 shoe so I have no idea if they will even work or not. I did not want to cut them down to fit in case they don't work. I ordered the 7 - 7 1/2 since that was the only option for size 7 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: bjwagner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son because he's been having knee problems... He's only 11 and not overweight at all... Very active... But I took him to a physical therapist - she said he had patellar femoral dysfunction..... So I looked it up and there were four causes, three were weak muscles (not possible with him Lol) and the fourth was flat feet... And sure enough, he has very flat feet. So I ordered these insoles which he loves- even his therapist looked at them and said they were very good... And they are helping improve his gait. :D. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old daughter who has pretty bad pronation. While I was waiting to see a Podiatrist re her feet she wore these inserts. And her pain was reduced by 80-90%. We still were advised by her doctor to get medical inserts because her case is pretty bad. But I was very happy with these and it helped my child not to cry at night. And that alone was worth the money. I will still keep them and have them for a backup pair when she visits her father on weekends. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: southernbelle2012

customer_reviews.title: Really Helps!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they felt weird and maybe uncomfortable when I put them in at first. But I walked all day that day and my feet didn’t hurt! It only took that day to get used to and now I want them in every shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with these insoles. They're sturdy and fit well in my shoes. Only problem is, after a break-in period, they still hurt my arch and I can't use them for plantar fasciitis. Other inserts purchased from podiatrists have brought relief pretty quickly. Unfortunately, not these.
customer_reviews.author: Fergie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible no relief
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Super flat no arch support. The ones your sneakers come are about the same. Had no pain relief with these. For 40 bucks no way
customer_reviews.author: Laura t

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from heel spur and I ordered this after reading reviews but it’s a total waste of money I wud want a full refund did not help me at all !
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Shah

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent. Support for flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my flat feet! They provide the support I needed now that I run 4 to 5 times a week. No more shin pain. No more foot pain. Money very well spent.
customer_reviews.author: WPadro

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: I have had foot problems since the 1980's. I have had several sets of very costly orthotics, in soles, etc. Samurai orthotics are very comfortable and provide good arch support. I use them in my RN work shoes and my athletic shoes. I just got some for my husband, and he is very happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife (flat feet) she loved them! But you must be sure that your shoes have removable insoles before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hisham

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Before I put them in my sneakers I would be in pain after walking for 20 min. Now I can keep on going without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MariC

customer_reviews.title: These insoles are good. They fit
customer_reviews.text: These insoles are good. They fit. I don't know if they are worth the price. They don't seem any better than Dr. Scholls for 7 bucks at Walgreens. Here is the thing about flat feet..if they are pathologically flat, then any added arch is like adding a pressure point to your instep. If they are just mildly faller arches, buy a running shoe made for flat feet. These inserts do not hurt, but I am not sure how much they help. Too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support but a little shallow for the shoes they were in. I added a terrycloth sole on top and that solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and I didn't need a break-in period.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Way too Big to Fit Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed....they might fit in a size 6 1/2 but they are much too wide for any of my size 6 shoes. Wish I had opened them sooner so I could have sent them back....stupidly thought they would fit... After all, I have been wearing insoles for years and this was first brand I have bought that were too big -- I think I would have to go up a whole shoe size for these to fit the shoe and still have room for my foot (now I supposed with some heavy duty cutters someone might be able to cut them down).
customer_reviews.author: Lee and Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love my Samurai insoles they are the best orthotic I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Samurai insoles they are the best orthotic I have ever worn they help my feet a lot. And I had tried lots and lots of other brands in my day but these are the best ! You can count on these to make your feet feel better! Denise Bonardi
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bonardi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Samurai insoles as they are very comfortable to wear and supportive .
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Black

customer_reviews.title: My daughter finds the very helpful for her flat feet ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter finds the very helpful for her flat feet. They help keep her feet at a more balanced angle while walking or running.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmila R Ravula

customer_reviews.title: Love them. I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I will be ordering more. They fit great in my casual sneaker and feel good!
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: have been wearing expensive orthotics for years--just put these in my shoes and walked in them all day! they are great
customer_reviews.author: annette levin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic first few days with these insoles.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with these inserts. I have Morton's neuroma in both of my feet, falling arches - these insoles really do help. The insoles that came with my running shoes (I wear Brooks Ghost) are ok, but these are so much better. AND much less expensive than custom orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

product_meta.title: Samurai Insoles Instant Relief Orthotics for Flat Feet - Plantar Fasciitis Pain Relief Guaranteed
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :13 x 5 x 2 inches; 3.21 Ounces
 * Item model number :BD20919
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :October 15, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Samurai Insoles
 * ASIN :B00OJCPU6E

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #24,570 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household)  *  #98 inShoe Insoles 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars2,276 ratings
feature_bullets: PAINFUL, FLAT FEET? FALLEN arches? SKIP THE PRICEY $500 INSOLES: As a LEADING PODIATRIST (with flat feet!) I realize that MOST SHOE INSERTS have “PROBLEMS”. They require cutting or have rock-hard arch support that radiates pain up your legs. That’s why I assembled a "DREAM TEAM" of INDUSTRY LEADERS to BIOMECHANICALLY ENGINEER Samurai Insoles! They OPTIMIZE the FUNCTION of your FEET & LEGS – COMBINING the BEST BENEFITS of an ARCH SUPPORT SHOE INSERT & CUSTOM ORTHOTICS, for 1/10th the investment!

PODIATRIST DESIGNED, PROVEN BY 1,000+ REVIEWS – FIX FOOT PAIN AT THE ROOT: If you’re tired of foot conditions limiting your mobility, then you’ll love how Samurai Insoles GENTLY CORRECT the OVERPRONATION associated with LOW or FALLEN ARCHES and provide a CLOUD-LIKE PILLOW of SUPPORT for flat feet for QUICK RELIEF from plantar fasciitis and heel pain, especially if you're someone who can't tolerate rigid orthotic inserts for shoes or overly firm arch supports for flat feet.

“THEY FIT!” NO GUESSWORK, NO CUTTING, NO STUFFING: Let’s be honest, most orthotics shoes and insoles are just plain ugly and make you want to hide your feet. Samurai Insoles' SLIM, LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN SUPPORTS YOUR CHOSEN FASHION. Know your shoes size? Great! Simply choose your STANDARD SHOE SIZE above, slide them in, and WEAR THEM IN YOUR FAVORITE FOOTWEAR – whether you love sneakers, boots, clogs, slippers, or flats.

THE SECRET? LOOK INSIDE OUR insoles. While most ARCH SUPPORT SHOE INSERTS are nothing more than fancy colored foam, or unforgiving hard plastic, we snuck a SPRINGY, FLEXIBLE INNER CORE INSIDE the insert. What customers love most is how it PROVIDES AMPLE SUPPORT, BOUNCES BACK & MOLDS TO YOUR FEET as YOU MOVE - so you get ideal support in all the right places whether you’re running, bicycling, jogging, water skiing, or jumping on the trampoline.

INSTANT PAIN RELIEF, GUARANTEED? YES! AND CUSTOMERS AGREE, “They just work”. Because we geek out about fixing foot pain, we could talk endlessly about WHY these are the best MEDICAL GRADE inserts we’ve ever ENGINEERED for my patients, in a STATE-of-the-ART ORTHOTIC LABORATORY right here in the USA. But you want A SOLUTION, NOT A STORY so we’ll just tell you to TRY THEM RISK FREE. Let us PROVE they’ll RELIEVE YOUR PAIN and leave your FEET FEELING AMAZING. Or your money back.
